comment: Sludge quality observed schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.WaterQuality/master/SludgeQualityObserved/schema.json
description: Sludge Quality data model is intended to represent sludge quality parameters.

contents.name: AOX
contents.comment: Concentration of Adsorbable Organically bound halogens (AOX)

contents.name: As
contents.comment: Arsenic. Concentration of arsenic

contents.name: B
contents.comment: Boron. Concentration of boron

contents.name: Be
contents.comment: Beryllium. Concentration of Beryllium

contents.name: C-ORG
contents.comment: Organic Carbon. Concentration of organic carbon

contents.name: C10-C40
contents.comment: Concentration of Hydrocarbons C10-C40

contents.name: Cd
contents.comment: Cadmium. Concentration of cadmium

contents.name: Cr
contents.comment: Chromium. Concentration of chromium

contents.name: Cr-VI
contents.comment: Chromium VI. Concentration of chromium at the oxidation state +6

contents.name: Cu
contents.comment: Copper. Concentration of copper

contents.name: DEHP
contents.comment: Diethylhexyl phthalate. Concentration of DEHP

contents.name: Hg
contents.comment: Mercury. Concentration of mercury

contents.name: IPA
contents.comment: Sum of isopropyl alcohol Sum of content of isopropyl alcohol

contents.name: K-TOT
contents.comment: Total potassium. Total content of potassium

contents.name: N-TOT
contents.comment: Total Nitrogen. Total Nitrogen (TN) is the sum of nitrate-nitrogen (NO3-N), nitrite-nitrogen (NO2-N), ammonia-nitrogen (NH3-N) and organically bonded nitrogen

contents.name: Ni
contents.comment: Nickel. Concentration of Nickel

contents.name: P-TOT
contents.comment: Total Phosphorus. Total phosphorus is a measure of all forms of phosphorus in the water, including dissolved and particulate, organic and inorganic

contents.name: PCB
contents.comment: Polychlorinated biphenyls Concentration of polychlorinated biphenyls

contents.name: Se
contents.comment: Selenium. Concentration of selenium

contents.name: Zn
contents.comment: Zinc. Concentration of zinc

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateObserved
contents.comment: The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat. It can be represented by an specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: faecal-coliforms
contents.comment: Concentration of fecal coliforms (Most Probable Number per gram solids)

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: pH
contents.comment: Acidity or basicity of an aqueous solution

contents.name: salmonella
contents.comment: Concentration of Salmonella (Most Probable Number per gram solids)

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: toluene
contents.comment: Concentration of Toluene

contents.name: measurand
contents.comment: An array of strings containing details (see format below) about extra measurands provided by this observation

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
